cards.name: Shadow Clone Jutsu
cards.description: Creates physical clones that can fight independently

cards.name: Rasengan
cards.description: A spinning sphere of chakra formed in the user's palm

cards.description: A larger, more powerful version of the Rasengan

cards.name: Vermillion Rasengan
cards.description: Rasengan infused with Nine-Tails chakra, glowing red

cards.name: Wind Style: Rasenshuriken
cards.description: Ultimate wind release Rasengan that strikes at cellular level

cards.name: Planetary Rasengan

cards.name: Tailed Beast Bomb
cards.description: Devastating chakra sphere combining positive and negative energy

cards.name: Flying Raijin: Rasengan
cards.description: Teleports to the target and strikes with Rasengan

cards.name: Flying Thunder God Technique
cards.description: Space-time ninjutsu allowing instant teleportation

cards.id: Summoning Jutsu: Bring Down the House Jutsu
cards.name: Summoning Jutsu: Bring Down the House Jutsu
cards.description: Removes summoning contracts from targets

cards.name: Sage Mode: Massive Rasengan
cards.description: Jiraiya's version of the Rasengan

cards.name: Massive Rasengan
cards.description: Jiraiya's oversized Rasengan technique

cards.name: Fire Style: Flame Bomb
cards.description: Shoots a massive fireball at the enemy

cards.name: Wild Lion's Mane Technique
cards.description: Extends and hardens hair to attack or defend

cards.name: Sage Art: Bath of Boiling Oil
cards.description: Combined fire and oil technique creating massive flames

cards.name: Fire Style: Fireball Jutsu
cards.description: Uchiha clan technique that shoots a massive fireball

cards.name: Fire Style: Phoenix Flower Jutsu
cards.description: Multiple small fireballs that can be guided with shuriken

cards.name: Fire Style: Dragon Flame Jutsu
cards.description: Creates dragon-shaped flames along a wire

cards.name: Chidori
cards.description: Lightning blade that pierces through anything

cards.name: Chidori Stream
cards.description: Releases Chidori as electrical currents from the body

cards.name: Chidori Sharp Spear
cards.description: Extends Chidori into a blade for long-range attacks

cards.name: Kirin
cards.description: Guides natural lightning in the form of a divine beast

cards.name: Amaterasu
cards.description: Black flames that burn anything, even fire itself

cards.name: Blaze Release: Kagutsuchi
cards.description: Manipulates the shape of Amaterasu flames

cards.name: Indra's Arrow
cards.description: Ultimate lightning technique combining Susanoo and nature energy

cards.name: Chidori
cards.description: Kakashi's original lightning blade technique

cards.name: Lightning Blade
cards.description: Enhanced Chidori that can cut through lightning itself

cards.name: Purple Lightning
cards.description: Kakashi's self-developed lightning technique after losing Sharingan

cards.name: Water Style: Water Dragon Jutsu
cards.description: Creates a dragon of water to attack enemies

cards.name: Earth Style: Earth Wall
cards.description: Raises a defensive wall of earth

cards.name: Kamui
cards.description: Mangekyou Sharingan technique that warps space itself

cards.name: Amaterasu
cards.description: Highest level Fire Release, black flames that never extinguish

cards.name: Tsukuyomi
cards.description: Mangekyou Sharingan genjutsu that controls time and space

cards.name: Clone Great Explosion
cards.description: Shadow clone that explodes when struck

cards.name: Water Style: Water Severing Wave
cards.description: High-pressure water jet that can cut through almost anything

cards.name: Water Style: Water Dragon Jutsu
cards.description: Tobirama's signature water dragon technique

cards.name: Flying Thunder God Technique
cards.description: Tobirama's space-time ninjutsu, inherited by Minato

cards.name: Tandem Paper Bombs
cards.description: Infinite chain of exploding tags

cards.name: Wood Style: Deep Forest Emergence
cards.description: Creates a massive forest from the ground

cards.name: Wood Style: Wood Dragon Jutsu
cards.description: Creates a massive wooden dragon that suppresses chakra

cards.name: Wood Style: Wooden Golem Jutsu

cards.name: Sand Coffin
cards.description: Encases target in sand

cards.description: Crushes enemies trapped in Sand Coffin
